title: Ground Floor 2-Bedroom Available Soon!! Convenient Location
posting_body: If you are looking for convenience and comfort, then Alderbrooke is your choice for Lynnwood apartments!
Conveniently located one block from the Alderwood Mall, Costco, movie theaters, great restaurants and plenty of shopping!
You have easy freeway access to both I-5 and I-405, making it a spectacular location for commuters.
Or if you prefer to be eco-friendly, Alderbrooke is located right on the Community Transit bus route for a money-saving commute to Seattle, Everett and the eastside.
Alderbrooke is a beautifully landscaped community and is walking distance to one of Lynnwood’s nicest parks, Pioneer Park, featuring tennis courts, a playground, and winding walking trail.
Our community also offers fantastic views of the Cascade Mountains.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 908 Sq.
- Vaulted Ceilings in Top Floor Homes
Dog Breed Restrictions include: Cane Carsos, Pit Bulls, Rottweilers, Doberman Pinschers, any hybrid or mixed breed of one of the aforementioned breeds.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
